LanguageData.DankPyon_NoResourcesFound: No pressable resources found in this map.
LanguageData.DankPyon_SelectResource: Select a type of resource to be pressed
LanguageData.DankPyon_StartInsertionResourceDesc: Bring resource to the press to start pressing
LanguageData.DankPyon_RemoveResourceDesc: Remove the resource from the press. This can only be done before you start pressing it.
LanguageData.DankPyon_CancelBringingResourceDesc: Cancel bringing resource to the press.
LanguageData.DankPyon_WaitTillJobsEndResource: Wait until the resource has been brought to the press, or cancel the job.
LanguageData.DankPyon_EngageResourceDesc: Start pressing resource. This process takes 5 days and can't be interrupted, or the resource will be destroyed.
LanguageData.DankPyon_ResourceFinished: A resource has finished processing in the press
LanguageData.DankPyon_ResourceInProgress: A {0} is pressing. It will be ready in {1}
LanguageData.DankPyon_ResourceReady: A resource has finished pressing and is waiting for pickup
LanguageData.DankPyon_ResourceImproperlyDefined: This resource has been improperly defined to work with the press, contact the resource mod's author
LanguageData.DankPyon_NoMeatsFound: No meats found in this map.
LanguageData.DankPyon_SelectMeat: Select a type of meat to be smoked
LanguageData.DankPyon_StartInsertionMeatDesc: Bring meat to the smoker to start smoking
LanguageData.DankPyon_RemoveMeatDesc: Remove the meat from the smoker. This can only be done before you start smoking it.
LanguageData.DankPyon_CancelBringingMeatDesc: Cancel bringing meat to the smoker.
LanguageData.DankPyon_WaitTillJobsEndMeat: Wait until the meat has been brought to the smoker, or cancel the job.
LanguageData.DankPyon_EngageMeatDesc: Start smoking meat. This process takes a day and can't be interrupted, or the meat will be destroyed.
LanguageData.DankPyon_SmokedMeatFinished: Smoked meats have finished cooking in the smoker
LanguageData.DankPyon_SmokedMeatInProgress: A {0} is being smoked. It will be ready in {1}
LanguageData.DankPyon_SmokedMeatReady: meats have finished smoking and is waiting for pickup
LanguageData.DankPyon_StartInsertionMeatRackDesc: Bring meat to the drying rack to start drying
LanguageData.DankPyon_RemoveMeatRackDesc: Remove the meat from the drying rack. This can only be done before you start drying it.
LanguageData.DankPyon_CancelBringingMeatRackDesc: Cancel bringing meat to the drying rack.
LanguageData.DankPyon_WaitTillJobsEndMeatRack: Wait until the meat has been brought to the drying rack, or cancel the job.
LanguageData.DankPyon_EngageMeatRackDesc: Start drying meat. This process takes a day and can't be interrupted, or the meat will be destroyed.
LanguageData.DankPyon_DriedMeatFinished: Dried meats have finished drying in the drying rack
LanguageData.DankPyon_DriedMeatInProgress: A {0} is being dried. It will be ready in {1}
LanguageData.DankPyon_DriedMeatRackReady: meats have finished drying and is waiting for pickup
LanguageData.DankPyon_DryingRackEmpty: Drying rack is empty right now
LanguageData.DankPyon_NoHayFound: No hay found in this map.
LanguageData.DankPyon_StartInsertionHayDesc: Bring hay to the rack to start drying
LanguageData.DankPyon_RemoveHayDesc: Remove the hay from the drying rack. This can only be done before you start drying it.
LanguageData.DankPyon_CancelBringingHayDesc: Cancel bringing hay to the drying rack.
LanguageData.DankPyon_WaitTillJobsEndHay: Wait until the hay has been brought to the drying rack, or cancel the job.
LanguageData.DankPyon_EngageHayDesc: Start drying hay. This process take 3 days.
LanguageData.DankPyon_StrawFinished: Straw have finished drying in the drying rack
LanguageData.DankPyon_StrawInProgress: A {0} is being dried. It will be ready in {1}
LanguageData.DankPyon_StrawReady: hay have finished drying and is waiting for pickup
LanguageData.DankPyon_StartInsertionAleOrMustDesc: Bring wort or must to the fermenting barrel to start fermentation
LanguageData.DankPyon_CancelBringingAleOrMustDesc: Cancel bringing wort or must must to the fermenting barrel.
LanguageData.DankPyon_JuiceAppleCurrentlyFrozen: This unfermented apple juice is frozen and will not mature into cider
LanguageData.DankPyon_JuiceAppleCurrentlyRefrigerated: This unfermented apple juice is refrigerated and will not mature into cider as fast as it could (matures in {0})
LanguageData.DankPyon_JuiceAppleMaturingCorrectly: This unfermented apple juice is maturing into cider correctly (matures in {0})
LanguageData.DankPyon_Hide_Description: These raw hides and pelts were removed from a creature, and with the right skills and tools, could be processed into tanned leather.
LanguageData.DankPyon_Plank_Description: Useful for building structures and weapons. It is a good fuel for campfires.
LanguageData.DankPyon_TrollSwallowDesc: The ancient troll swallowed one of your pawns! Make sure to kill it in time, to retrieve the pawn alive.
LanguageData.DankPyon_CommandSetTargetFuelLevelDesc: Set the target food amount. Colonists will attempt to fill this up to the target food amount.
LanguageData.DankPyon_MealSlop_CommandToggleAllowAuto: Sets whether or not automatic refueling is allowed.
LanguageData.DankPyon_SlopRotting: Starting to go bad due to lack of fuel.
LanguageData.DankPyon_GatherIceDesc: Collect ice or water from approriate terrain.
LanguageData.DankPyon_MustBeIce: Terrain must be ice or water
LanguageData.DankPyon_AlpAttackLetterText: A chilling wind sweeps through the area as multiple Alps emerge from the shadows, their ghastly forms gliding silently amidst the dense fog. With their pale, featureless faces and unsettling exposed teeth, they evoke a deep sense of dread in those who catch a glimpse. Whispers of fear spread through the camp as the undead raiders advance, hungry for chaos and despair.
LanguageData.DankPyon_OilWeaponDesc: This weapon is coated with {0}. Remaining uses: {1}.
